mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.nmfwczrks AS "nmfwczrks", a.qzldlsets AS "qzldlsets", a.qzldssets AS "qzldssets", a.qzlswsysrks AS "qzlswsysrks", a.nmjmjkdaljjdrs AS "nmjmjkdaljjdrs", a.qzgfhdzdars AS "qzgfhdzdars", a.nnjsjkjyrcs AS "nnjsjkjyrcs", a.nnldlsetyfjzrcs AS "nnldlsetyfjzrcs", a.nmldlsetjkglrs AS "nmldlsetjkglrs", a.nmycfjkglrs AS "nmycfjkglrs", a.nmlswsyslrjkglr AS "nmlswsyslrjkglr", a.nmgxygfglrs AS "nmgxygfglrs", a.nmtnbgfglrs AS "nmtnbgfglrs", a.nmzxjszahzglrs AS "nmzxjszahzglrs", a.nmfjhhzglrs AS "nmfjhhzglrs", a.nncrbhtfggwssjbgls AS "nncrbhtfggwssjbgls", a.nnwsjdxgxxbgls AS "nnwsjdxgxxbgls", a.nmldssetzyyjkglrs AS "nmldssetzyyjkglrs", a.nmlswyslrzyyjkglrs AS "nmlswyslrzyyjkglrs", a.date AS "date", a.doc_id AS "doc_id"
mapper.select:
SELECT a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.nmfwczrks AS "nmfwczrks", a.qzldlsets AS "qzldlsets", a.qzldssets AS "qzldssets", a.qzlswsysrks AS "qzlswsysrks", a.nmjmjkdaljjdrs AS "nmjmjkdaljjdrs", a.qzgfhdzdars AS "qzgfhdzdars", a.nnjsjkjyrcs AS "nnjsjkjyrcs", a.nnldlsetyfjzrcs AS "nnldlsetyfjzrcs", a.nmldlsetjkglrs AS "nmldlsetjkglrs", a.nmycfjkglrs AS "nmycfjkglrs", a.nmlswsyslrjkglr AS "nmlswsyslrjkglr", a.nmgxygfglrs AS "nmgxygfglrs", a.nmtnbgfglrs AS "nmtnbgfglrs", a.nmzxjszahzglrs AS "nmzxjszahzglrs", a.nmfjhhzglrs AS "nmfjhhzglrs", a.nncrbhtfggwssjbgls AS "nncrbhtfggwssjbgls", a.nnwsjdxgxxbgls AS "nnwsjdxgxxbgls", a.nmldssetzyyjkglrs AS "nmldssetzyyjkglrs", a.nmlswyslrzyyjkglrs AS "nmlswyslrzyyjkglrs", a.date AS "date", a.doc_id AS "doc_id" FROM ironfo_public_health a
a.doc_id = #{doc_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ironfo_public_health( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, nmfwczrks, qzldlsets, qzldssets, qzlswsysrks, nmjmjkdaljjdrs, qzgfhdzdars, nnjsjkjyrcs, nnldlsetyfjzrcs, nmldlsetjkglrs, nmycfjkglrs, nmlswsyslrjkglr, nmgxygfglrs, nmtnbgfglrs, nmzxjszahzglrs, nmfjhhzglrs, nncrbhtfggwssjbgls, nnwsjdxgxxbgls, nmldssetzyyjkglrs, nmlswyslrzyyjkglrs, date, doc_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{nmfwczrks}, #{qzldlsets}, #{qzldssets}, #{qzlswsysrks}, #{nmjmjkdaljjdrs}, #{qzgfhdzdars}, #{nnjsjkjyrcs}, #{nnldlsetyfjzrcs}, #{nmldlsetjkglrs}, #{nmycfjkglrs}, #{nmlswsyslrjkglr}, #{nmgxygfglrs}, #{nmtnbgfglrs}, #{nmzxjszahzglrs}, #{nmfjhhzglrs}, #{nncrbhtfggwssjbgls}, #{nnwsjdxgxxbgls}, #{nmldssetzyyjkglrs}, #{nmlswyslrzyyjkglrs}, #{date}, #{doc_id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ironfo_public_health SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, nmfwczrks = #{nmfwczrks}, qzldlsets = #{qzldlsets}, qzldssets = #{qzldssets}, qzlswsysrks = #{qzlswsysrks}, nmjmjkdaljjdrs = #{nmjmjkdaljjdrs}, qzgfhdzdars = #{qzgfhdzdars}, nnjsjkjyrcs = #{nnjsjkjyrcs}, nnldlsetyfjzrcs = #{nnldlsetyfjzrcs}, nmldlsetjkglrs = #{nmldlsetjkglrs}, nmycfjkglrs = #{nmycfjkglrs}, nmlswsyslrjkglr = #{nmlswsyslrjkglr}, nmgxygfglrs = #{nmgxygfglrs}, nmtnbgfglrs = #{nmtnbgfglrs}, nmzxjszahzglrs = #{nmzxjszahzglrs}, nmfjhhzglrs = #{nmfjhhzglrs}, nncrbhtfggwssjbgls = #{nncrbhtfggwssjbgls}, nnwsjdxgxxbgls = #{nnwsjdxgxxbgls}, nmldssetzyyjkglrs = #{nmldssetzyyjkglrs}, nmlswyslrzyyjkglrs = #{nmlswyslrzyyjkglrs}, date = #{date}, doc_id = #{doc_id} WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE ironfo_public_health SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, nmfwczrks = #{nmfwczrks}, qzldlsets = #{qzldlsets}, qzldssets = #{qzldssets}, qzlswsysrks = #{qzlswsysrks}, nmjmjkdaljjdrs = #{nmjmjkdaljjdrs}, qzgfhdzdars = #{qzgfhdzdars}, nnjsjkjyrcs = #{nnjsjkjyrcs}, nnldlsetyfjzrcs = #{nnldlsetyfjzrcs}, nmldlsetjkglrs = #{nmldlsetjkglrs}, nmycfjkglrs = #{nmycfjkglrs}, nmlswsyslrjkglr = #{nmlswsyslrjkglr}, nmgxygfglrs = #{nmgxygfglrs}, nmtnbgfglrs = #{nmtnbgfglrs}, nmzxjszahzglrs = #{nmzxjszahzglrs}, nmfjhhzglrs = #{nmfjhhzglrs}, nncrbhtfggwssjbgls = #{nncrbhtfggwssjbgls}, nnwsjdxgxxbgls = #{nnwsjdxgxxbgls}, nmldssetzyyjkglrs = #{nmldssetzyyjkglrs}, nmlswyslrzyyjkglrs = #{nmlswyslrzyyjkglrs}
WHERE id = #{id}
